p:
Among participants in the brief intervention group, 140 (95.2%) attended at least 1 in-person session, and 124 (84.4%) attended all 4 sessions. The initial session was a mean of 57 minutes in duration (range, 27-78 minutes), and the second was a mean of 31 minutes (range, 24-38 minutes). Both phone sessions lasted a mean of 9 minutes (range, 6-12 minutes). In addition to high rates of session attendance, counselors had high fidelity to the combined intervention manual (mean [SD] YACS score,
28 5.05 [0.54]) and the brief intervention manual (mean [SD] YACS score, 5.45 [0.31]).
